product_name: CliniqueMoisture Surge Intense 72H Lipid-Replenishing Hydrator Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Moisture Surge Intense 72H Lipid-Replenishing Hydrator is a rich cream-gel that delivers 72-hour hydration for velvety-smooth skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Very Dry to Dry, Dry Combination.Concern: Dehydration, dry skin.Moisture Surge Intense 72H Hydrator Moisturizer is a rich cream-gel face moisturizer that delivers an instant moisture boost, then keeps skin continuously hydrated for 72 hours.If you’re looking for a cream for dry skin, this intensely hydrating formula with activated aloe water and caffeine sets nonstop hydration into motion. Then locks it in with a trio of lipids, strengthening skin's barrier to keep moisture in and help keep aggressors out.Formulated with cica, it helps soothe and comfort dry or dehydrated skin.Leaves skin plump, glowing, and velvety-smooth.Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Key IngredientsActivated aloe water: Water is infused with aloe leaf extract to help deliver intense hydration.Cica: Also known as tiger grass, cica is a centuries-old ingredient traditionally used in Chinese medicine for its healing properties. Helps soothe dry, delicate skin.Auto-Replenishing Lipid-Filler Technology: Using activated aloe water and caffeine, this technology helps trigger skin's internal water source so skin can continuously hydrate itself. Uses three types of lipids to reinforce and strengthen skin's barrier, helping lock in and retain moisture.Research ResultsMoisture Surge Intense 72H Hydrator was tested on women in Siberia during winter, where they face extreme weather conditions. The results were glowing.*Immediately:98% said their skin felt hydrated.97% said their skin felt soft.94% said their skin felt protected in extreme cold.98% said their tight, dry skin felt relieved.In 1 week:91% said their skin was glowing.91% said their skin felt plump.92% said their skin felt less irritated.In 4 weeks:98% said their skin felt deeply hydrated.96% said their skin felt healthier.98% said their skin looked dewy.94% said their skin felt comforted.96% said their skin felt deeply nourished.*Consumer testing on 106 women after using the product for 4 weeks.Item 2568219How To UseApply moisturizer AM and PM on clean skin. Use alone or under makeup, on dry spots, or as a 5-minute mask. Follow with Clinique All About Eyes Eye Cream.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Isostearate, Dipropylene Glycol, Squalane, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Silica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica (Hydrocotyl) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Bran Extract, Caffeine, Methyl Trimethicone, Sorbitol, Sodium Polyaspartate, Petrolatum, Trehalose, Whey Protein\Lactis Protein\Protéine Du Petit-Lait, Linoleic Acid, Pyridoxine Dipalmitate, Butylene Glycol, Cholesterol, Sucrose, Polysilicone-11, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, PEG-150, PEG-8, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Hydroxyacetophenone, BHT, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hexametaphosphate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply moisturizer AM and PM on clean skin. Use alone or under makeup, on dry spots, or as a 5-minute mask. Follow with Clinique All About Eyes Eye Cream.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: I am never without it!
reviews.comments: I've been using moisture surge for several years now. It gives my skin just the right amount of hydration without feeling heavy on my skin. Definitely a must have for the fall/winter months.

reviews.headline: Melts into my skin
reviews.comments: I have really dry skin and certain products had started making my skin peel, replaced my moisturizer with this and no more problems

reviews.headline: Addicted to this product
reviews.comments: I LOVE the intense as it is so creamy & flows so easily.

reviews.headline: Not 72 H
reviews.comments: It doesn't last 72 H

reviews.headline: will buy again extremely dry skin
reviews.comments: I've used this for 7 days, morning and night.   It is helping with my chin are being so dry it peels in the morning

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Great product.

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: I recently started getting eczema on my face. This moisturizer cleared it up on the first application!

reviews.headline: I would buy again.
reviews.comments: My husband uses this cream on his face. He loves it.

reviews.headline: I donlike the product does not leave ypur face atick or cake
reviews.comments: Like

reviews.headline: Fantastic moisturizer for very dry skin!
reviews.comments: Ive been using this Moisture Surge Intense for quite awhile now. I use it just on the dry patches on my face.  It works so well and does its job.  I also use the regular Moisture Surge for my whole face.  If you are on the fence about this Intense version, try a small jar and you will love it.

reviews.headline: Very Hydrating
reviews.comments: I love how this just melts into my skin. I have mature skin I am 57 years old and love this moisturizer. A little goes a long way. This makes my face feel so hydrated and works well for night time skin care as well as my morning routine and under my makeup.

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: I purchased the 4.2 oz size and its huge, definitely more bang for your buck! This is the only thing thats come close to keeping my skin as hydrated as the Tatcha dewy skin cream. Not saying its a dupe but comes pretty close

reviews.headline: Clinique never disappoints
reviews.comments: I buy this moisturizer every summer. It's lighter than my winter go-to, but keeps my face just right the rest of the year.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I'm delighted with this product. I currently have mild rosacea, and my skin felt flaky and dry. After using this product my skin looks calm hydrated, and very soft. Of all the lines I've used this is definitely my favorite.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This is the only product that I've found to keep my VERY dry skin moisturized all day. Pricey, but it works for me so I will buy again.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I've been using Moisture Surge Intense for over 5 years now. I have very dry skin due to an auto immune and this has been the only moisturizer on the market that I have found that actually moisturizes my skin. It not only gives my skin a beautiful, dewy, and hydrated look/feel, but it also blends well with most of my foundation.

reviews.headline: Love Love Love this product
reviews.comments: Moisturizes my thirsty skin without being greasy!

reviews.headline: Defintely going to be a repurchase!!
reviews.comments: I have mature skin and have been looking for something that was good for super dry skin and this has been great!

reviews.headline: AMAZING MIRACLE IN A JAR! !!!
reviews.comments: This product saved my life!!!  I'm going through menopause and my skin changed big time!  It turned into skin dryer then the Mojave desert!  Nothing was working anymore & my makeup looked terrible until I found this MIRACLE IN A JAR!!!  It saved my skin and I was able to be confident wearing my makeup again!!!  Please do not stop making this!!!  If you are a menopausal woman with extremely dry skin try this product!! It will save your life!!  It's also amazing on my dry winter hands too!

reviews.headline: Truly fantastic
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this moisturizer it's not to heavy but very hydrating.

faceoff_positive.comments: I was upset because I thought I bought the wrong product but it ended up saving my skin!! My skin barrier was wrecked and because of that my skin felt so dry/dehydrated that nothing seemed to moisturize my skin. I gave this cream another shot and completely RESTORED MY SKIN BACK TO HEALTH! I hope that enough people realize how good this cream is so Clinique will continue to produce it. It feels heavy/greasy at first application, so let it sit for a minute and then it sort of melts from the temp of your skin and you can massage it into your skin more. The ingrediants are amazing too. Has centella asiatica which is great for calming my redness. I will be repurchasing. I now use mostly as a night cream but I will use in the morning if my skin is feeling more sensitive.
faceoff_positive.headline: RESTORED my skin barrier!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have been a dedicated user of Moisture Surge Intense (most recent name Moisture Surge Intense: Skin Fortifying Hydrator) for many years. In my teens and early twenties, my facial skin was dry, irritated, sensitive, and acne prone. I was overjoyed to discover Moisture Surge Intense in my mid-twenties as the only product that transformed my skin to be hydrated, soothed, and clear of breakouts. I have used it as my exclusive morning and night moisturizer for at least a decade now and wouldn't even try other moisturizers.

I was dismayed to receive my last order a few months ago and find it had a new name (Moisture Surge Intense: 72h Lipid Replenishing Hydrator) and a new color (now white rather than light pink), but was willing to give it a shot to see if the formula was the same or at least comparable. Unfortunately this was not the case. A few minutes into use, this moisturizer seemed to vanish completely and my skin started to feel dry and tight. A few days into use, my skin was feeling dry and irritated and this moisturizer caused burning and redness. A week or two into use, my skin was completely dehydrated with deep, painful acne spots.

I have since tried several other products to try and fill the hole in my skincare routine left by my discontinued holy grail. I set aside my frustration with Clinique and begrudgingly tried both the Moisture Surge 100h Auto-Replenishing Hydrator and the Turnaround Overnight Revitalizing Moisturizer. I have also tried more than 10 moisturizers marketed for dry and sensitive skin from other brands. Nothing compares to the original Moisture Surge Intense. My skin is a mess and nothing has worked to bring it back to a happy state.

Please, please, please bring back the original Moisture Surge Intense formula! This updated formula may work for many with less sensitive and dry skin, but for me it is unusable.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not the same as the original Moisture Surge Intense!

rollup.name: Moisture Surge Intense 72H Lipid-Replenishing Hydrator Moisturizer
